section.section:
A person may not counterfeit, cause to be counterfeited, or willingly aid or assist in counterfeiting:
a commission, patent, pardon, order for release, or other court document; or
a warrant, certificate, or other public security from which money may be drawn from the treasury of the State.

A person may not write, sign, or possess a counterfeit:
commission, patent, pardon, order for release, or other court document; or
warrant, certificate, or other public security from which money may be drawn from the treasury of the State.

text.section: A person who violates this section is guilty of a felony and on conviction is subject to imprisonment for not less than 2 years and not exceeding 10 years.
